headline: James River Announces Director Appointment
summary: PEMBROKE, Bermuda, July 24, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- James River Group Holdings, Ltd. ("James River" or the "Company") (NASDAQ: JRVR) today announced that Joel Cavaness has been appointed to the Company’s Board of Directors as an independent, non-executive member, effective immediately. Mr. Cavaness was also appointed to the Board’s Compensation and Human Capital Committee. “Joel is an accomplished executive in the wholesale brokerage space and has successfully built high-performing distribution

headline: Arthur J. Gallagher (AJG) Earnings Expected to Grow: Should You Buy?
summary: Arthur J. Gallagher (AJG) doesn't possess the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely earnings beat in its upcoming report. Get prepared with the key expectations.
